channel.title: Beyond the Sky on Solidforest
channel.description: Recent content in Beyond the Sky on Solidforest

item.title: Umbrella an Animated Short Film
item.description: Inspired by true events and filled with messages of empathy and hope, Umbrella follows Joseph’s story, a boy who lives in an orphanage and dreams of having a yellow Umbrella.

item.title: Quote from Steve Job
item.description: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. Don’t be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people’s thinking

item.title: Venusian on Solar System
item.description: Venusian surface was a subject of speculation until some of its secrets were revealed by planetary science in the 20th century. Venera landers in 1975 and 1982 returned images of a surface covered in sediment and relatively angular rocks.

item.title: Music is Healing
item.description: My music has been heavily influenced by bands such as “The Likes of Skream”, “Dirty Heads”, “The Knife”, “M83”, “Tool”, “Black Keys”, “Datsik”, “Pete Tong”, “Jethro Tull”, “The Cure”, and many more.
